name: logseq-solarized-extended-theme
author: yoyurec
description: Light sepia-solarized Logseq theme with extra stuff

themes.name: Solarized Extended Theme
themes.description: Light sepia-solarized Logseq theme with extra stuff

scripts.dev: parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && cp -f src/*.css dist
scripts.build: parcel build --no-source-maps src/index.html --public-url ./ && cp -f src/*.css dist
